name: Hyperlink urls
content: 1. GINA. Global strategy for asthma management and prevention. 2012. [Available at: http://www.ginasthma.org/local/uploads/files/GINA_Report_March13.pdf ]. 2. GINA. Global burden of asthma. 2004. [Available at: http://www.ginasthma.org/local/uploads/files/GINABurdenReport.pdf ]. 3. NIH. What is COPD? [Available at: http://www.nhlbi.nih.gov/health/health-topics/topics/copd/ ]. 4. British Thoracic Society. British guideline on the management of asthma: A quick reference guide. 2011. [Available at: http://www.sign.ac.uk/pdf/qrg101.pdf ]. 5. Assess peak flow meter with asthma management zone system. Instructions for use. 2004. [Available at: http://www.smprx.com/Assess Peak Flow Meter Manual.pdf ]. 6. GOLD. Spirometry for healthcare providers. 2010. [Available at: http://www.goldcopd.org/uploads/users/files/GOLD_Spirometry_2010.pdf ]. 7. Apfelbacher CJ, Jones C, Hankins M, et al. Validity of two common asthma-specific quality of life questionnaires: Juniper mini asthma quality of life questionnaire and Sydney asthma quality of life questionnaire. Health Qual Life Outcomes. 2012;10:97. 8. Carrard A, Pichler C. [House dust mite allergy]. Ther Umsch. 2012;69(4):249-252. 9. The Asthma Foundation. House dust mites. 2010. [Available at: http://asthmafoundation.org.nz/wp-content/uploads/2012/03/House_Dust_Mites1.pdf ]. 10. Zukiewicz-Sobczak WA. The role of fungi in allergic diseases. Recent 5-year trends of asthma severity and allergen sensitization among children in southern Thailand. Asian Pac J Allergy Immunol. 2013;31(3):242-246. 12. Burke H, Leonardi-Bee J, Hashim A, et al. Prenatal and passive smoke exposure and incidence of asthma and wheeze: systematic review and meta-analysis. Pediatrics. 2012;129(4):735-744. 13. Jaakkola JJ, Gissler M. Maternal smoking in pregnancy, fetal development, and childhood asthma. Am J Public Health. 2004;94(1):136-140. 14. Diaz-Perales A, Gonzalez-de-Olano D, Perez-Gordo M, et al. Allergy to Uncommon Pets: New Allergies but the Same Allergens. Front Immunol. 2013;4:492. 15. Delgado J, Davila ID, Dominguez-Ortega J, et al. Quality of life in patients with respiratory allergy is influenced by the causative allergen. J Investig Allergol Clin Immunol. 2013;23(5):309-314. 16. Parsons JP, Hallstrand TS, Mastronarde JG, et al. An official American Thoracic Society clinical practice guideline: exercise-induced bronchoconstriction. Am J Respir Crit Care Med. 2013;187(9):1016-1027. 17. Hemila H. Vitamin C and common cold-induced asthma: a systematic review and statistical analysis. Allergy Asthma Clin Immunol. 2013;9(1):46. 18. author: George reith
